headline: Rockwell Automation Declares Quarterly Dividend at $1.31 Per Share on Common Stock
summary: The Board of Directors of Rockwell Automation, Inc. , following its regular review, today declared a quarterly dividend of $1.31 per share on its outstanding common stock, payable March 10, 2025, to...
